root.name: NHL Open Ice 2 on 2 Challenge
root.description: NHL Open Ice 2 on 2 Challenge is a four-player ice hockey video game developed by Midway as an arcade title in November 1995. The game features 26 NHL teams, over 100 players, Chicago Blackhawks longtime announcer Pat Foley, and a gameplay style that can be best described as similar to the over-the-top play of Midway's own NBA Jam.PlaystationIn 1996, the game would be released for the Sony PlayStation. The game would be similar to its arcade counterpart with exception to the fact that the Winnipeg Jets moved to Phoenix after the conclusion of the 1995-96 season, thus the Phoenix Coyotes replaced the Jets in the Playstation port.PCIn 1997, the game would be released for the PC, and features the same roster and teams as the Playstation version.Arcade (Version 1.21) RosterTeamGoaltenderPlayer
